_description: Macaronic quatrain, apparently from a popular song c. A.D. 1279, on dislike of the statute Quo warranto in Walter of Guisborough’s Chronicle (four out of ten MSS only)

BodDig170.Transcription:
Le Roy Couet nos denerse la Rayne nos beaus manersele Quo
                    worantoSale maketh vs all to do

BodDig168.Transcription:
le Roy couoyte nos deners& la Reyne nos beaux manerse le
                        Quo Varantosale make wus al at do
BodDig168.Note: Inserted in Latin prose. Written as prose.

CULDd25.Transcription:
Le rey coueit nos denerse la reyne nos beaus manerse le quo
                        warantosale maketh us alle to do

BLLan239.Transcription:
Le roy cuuayte nor denerese la Rayne nor beau manersele Quo
                    vorantosale mak wus al at do
